text: Dušan Maravić (Serbian Cyrillic: Душан Маравић; 7 March 1939 – 6 January 2025) was a Serbian footballer. He played as a midfielder. He played for the SFR Yugoslavia national team during the 1960 Summer Olympics. He won a gold medal. Maravić died on 6 January 2025 at the age of 85.È morta la leggenda della Stella Rossa Dušan Maravić ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Serbian footballers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Footballers from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:People from Ain
title: Dušan Maravić
